title: Single Number (XOR)
statement: Given a non-empty array of integers where every element appears twice except for one, find that single one. Use XOR for linear time and constant space.
input_format:
First line contains N.
Second line contains N space-separated integers.
constraints:
1 <= N <= 3 * 10^4
-3 * 10^4 <= nums[i] <= 3 * 10^4
N is odd (one element appears once, rest appear twice)
